Time flies, we are already celebrating the first anniversary of Genshin Impact! On this memorable day, we have also prepared gifts for everyone! Participate in the event to make your own personalized anniversary card and you will have the chance to win the [[Blessing of the Welkin Moon]] prize~

==Summary==
During the event, Travelers can take part in a raffle by creating their own anniversary cards. After the event ends, we will randomly select 10% of the participants to receive the Blessing of the Welkin Moon ×1. The remaining participants who are not selected will be rewarded with Mora ×100,000.

==Event Duration==
* Event Duration: September 29 – October 7
* Results: October 8, 2021 16:00 (UTC+8)
** After the rewards are announced, the rewards will be sent directly to your in-game mailbox. It will not be necessary to return to the event page to collect your rewards.

==Eligibility==
* [[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above

==How to Participate==
Through the links posted by each official community on September 29.

===Rewards Issuance===
Rewards will be issued via in-game mail after the results are announced on 2021/10/08 16:00 (there may be some delay in the delivery of rewards). The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the attached compensation in time.

==HoYoLAB Daily Check-In Bonus Rewards==
[[File:HoYoLAB Daily Check-In Bonus Rewards Inssuance.png|thumb|200px|right]]
All Travelers who have successfully participated in the "A Message in Time" web event can also participate in [[HoYoLAB Community Daily Check-In]] from October 1 – 7 (UTC+8) to get daily double rewards during the period!

Starting Period for Double Rewards: October 9, 2021 after 16:00
